Array< Element > Class Template Reference

#include <array.hpp>

Detailed Description

template<typename Element>
class Array< Element >

A simple array.

Template Parameters:
ElementThe type of elements stored in the array.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

template<typename Element>
Array< Element >::Array ( Size  size = 0) [explicit]

Allocate an array of the specified size, or an empty one when the size is omitted.

All elements will be constructed with their default constructor.

Deconstruct the elements and deallocate the array.

Definition at line 77 of file array.hpp.

Member Function Documentation

template<typename Element>
void Array< Element >::reset ( Size  new_size = 0)

Reset the array.

All elements will be deconstructed and the array will be deallocated. If a new size is given, new elements will be allocated and constructed with their default constructor.

Parameters:
new_sizeThe new size of the array.

Definition at line 52 of file array.hpp.

template<typename Element>
void Array< Element >::clear ( )

Clear the array.

All elements will be reset to their default value.
